title: Average retail price for regular gasoline at self-service stations in Canada 2019
summary: The graph shows the Average retail price for regular gasoline in Canada 2019 .
The lowest Average is in Jannuary .
From February till July the graph oscillate .
gold: The chart shows the average retail price for regular gasoline at self-service stations across Canada in 2019 . After a drastic increase from the minimum of around 108 cents/litre in January to the maximum of around 131 cents/litre in May , the price gradually decreased , with some minor fluctuations , until the end of the year where it ended at around 115 cents/litre in December .
